enum_ent_sex.description: The biological sex of the user. (Required)

yr_ent_age.description: The age of the user in years. (Required)

cm_ent_height.description: The height of the user in centimeters. (Either the heigth in centimeters or in inches is required)

in_ent_height.description: The height of the user in inches. (Either the heigth in centimeters or in inches is required)

kg_ent_weight.description: The weight of the user in kilograms. (Either the weigth in kilograms or in pounds is required)

lbs_ent_weight.description: The weight of the user in pounds. (Either the weigth in kilograms or in pounds is required)

enum_ent_smoker.description: Current smoking status of the user. (Required)

bool_ent_bpMedication.description: Whether the user is on blood pressure medication. (Required)

bool_ent_familyHistory.description: Whether the user has a family history of cardiovascular diseases. (Optional)

enum_ent_chronicMedication.description: Chronic medication usage: none, one or two diseases, three or more diseases. (Optional)

mmHg_ent_systolicBP.description: Systolic blood pressure in mmHg. (Required IF diastolicBP present otherwise Optional)

mmHg_ent_diastolicBP.description: Diastolic blood pressure in mmHg. (Required IF SystolicBP present otherwise Optional)

arrayMmHg_ent_systolicBP.description: List of 3 Systolic blood pressure in mmHg. (Required IF diastolicBP array present otherwise Optional)

arrayMmHg_ent_diastolicBP.description: List of 3 Diastolic blood pressure in mmHg. (Required IF diastolicBP array present otherwise Optional)

bpm_ent_restingHeartRate.description: The resting heart rate in beats per minute. (Optional)

bool_ent_stepTestCompleted.description: Whether a step test was completed. (Required IF stepTestHeartRate present otherwise Optional)

bpm_ent_stepTestHeartRate.description: Heart rate in beats per minute recorded after completing a step test. (Required IF stepTestCompleted present otherwise Optional)

arrayEnum_ent_anxietySurvey.description: Anxiety survey. If present each question is required.

enum_ent_feelingNervousOrAnxious.description: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by feeling nervous, anxious or on edge?

enum_ent_controlWorrying.description: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by not being able to stop or control worrying?

enum_ent_excessiveWorrying.description: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by worrying too much about different things?

enum_ent_troubleRelaxing.description: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by trouble relaxing?

enum_ent_restlessness.description: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by being so restless that it is hard to sit still?

enum_ent_easilyAnnoyedOrIrritable.description: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by becoming easily annoyed or irritable?

enum_ent_feelingAfraid.description: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by feeling afraid as if something awful might happen?

arrayEnum_ent_depressionSurvey.description: Depression survey. If present each question is required.

enum_ent_lackOfInterest.description: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by little interest or pleasure in doing things?

enum_ent_feelingDepress.description: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by feeling down, depressed, or hopeless?

enum_ent_sleepProblems.description: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much?

enum_ent_fatigue.description: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by feeling tired or having little energy?

enum_ent_eatingIssues.description: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by poor appetite or overeating?

enum_ent_lowSelfEsteem.description: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down?

enum_ent_concentrationDifficulty.description: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television?

enum_ent_psychomotorChanges.description: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual.

enum_ent_suicidalThoughts.description: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself?

yr_raw_age.description: The age of the user in years.

cms_raw_bapwv.description: Calculated arterial stiffness, the Brachial-ankle pulse wave velocity (baPWV), of the user (cm/s). Using the mean arterial pressure (MAP) and resting heart rate (RHR)

kgsm_raw_bmi.description: Calculated body mass index (BMI) of the user (kg/m2). Using the weight and height

bpm_raw_maxHR.description: Calculated maximum heart rate (maxHR) of the user (bpm). Using the age

num_raw_crpi.description: Calculated C-ReactiveProtein Index (CRPI) of the user. Using the biological sex, cardioFitness, and METs degree

int_raw_framinghamScore.description: Calculated Framingham Score of the user. Using the age, biological sex, total cholesterol, HDL cholesterol, systolic blood pressure, smoking status, and blood pressure medication status

num_raw_hba1c.description: Calculated glycated hemoglobin (HbA1c) of the user (%). Using the biological sex, age, BMI, waist circumference, family history of diabetes, smoking status, and systolic blood pressure (sbp)

num_raw_lap.description: Calculated Lipid accumulation product (LAP) of the user. Using the biological sex, waist circumference, triglycerides

mmhg_raw_map.description: Calculated mean arterial pressure (MAP) of the user (mmHg). Using the systolic and diastolic blood pressure

num_raw_metSComp.description: Calculated metabolic syndrome components (MetSComp) of the user. Using the baPWV

num_raw_metSDegree.description: Calculated metabolic syndrome degree (MetSDegree) of the user. Using the waistToHeightRatio and waistToHipRatio

num_raw_fitness1.description: Calculated fitness1 of the user (mL/kg/min). Using the max Heart Rate (maxHR) and resting heart rate (RHR)

num_raw_fitness2.description: Calculated fitness2 of the user (mL/kg/min). Using the age, sex, activity level, bmi, resting heart rate (RHR)

num_raw_fitnessAvg.description: Calculated fitness1 and fitness2 average of the user (mL/kg/min). Using the fitness1 and fitness2

num_raw_cardioFitness3.description: Calculated cardio fitness value of the user (mL/kg/min).

num_raw_cardioFitness4.description: Calculated cardio fitness dwonstream value of the user (mL/kg/min).

num_raw_tenYrCvd.description: Calculated 10 year cardiovascular disease value of the user (%).

array_raw_corrHdlC.description: Calculated probability distribution of the Hdl Cholesterol of the user. Using the age, biological sex, cardio respiratory fitness

mmoll_raw_corrHdlMean.description: mean value of the Hdl Cholesterol of the user. Using the age, biological sex, cardio respiratory fitness

mmoll_raw_corrHdlStdev.description: standard deviation value of the Hdl Cholesterol of the user. Using the age, biological sex, cardio respiratory fitness

mmoll_adj_corrHdlRange.description: Calculated range values of the Hdl Cholesterol of the user. Using the age, biological sex, cardio respiratory fitness

array_raw_corrLdlC.description: Calculated probability distribution of the Ldl Cholesterol of the user. Using the age, biological sex, cardio respiratory fitness

mmoll_raw_corrLdlMean.description: mean value of the Ldl Cholesterol of the user. Using the age, biological sex, cardio respiratory fitness

mmoll_raw_corrLdlStdev.description: standard deviation value of the Ldl Cholesterol of the user. Using the age, biological sex, cardio respiratory fitness

mmoll_adj_corrLdlRange.description: Calculated range values of the Ldl Cholesterol of the user. Using the age, biological sex, cardio respiratory fitness

array_raw_corrTotalCholesterol.description: Calculated probability distribution of the total Cholesterol of the user. Using the age, biological sex, cardio respiratory fitness

mmoll_raw_corrTotalCholesterolMean.description: mean value of the total Cholesterol of the user. Using the age, biological sex, cardio respiratory fitness

mmoll_raw_corrTotalCholesterolStdev.description: standard deviation value of the total Cholesterol of the user. Using the age, biological sex, cardio respiratory fitness

mmoll_adj_corrTotalCholesterolRange.description: Calculated range values of the total Cholesterol of the user. Using the age, biological sex, cardio respiratory fitness

array_raw_corrTriglycerides.description: Calculated probability distribution of the triglycerides of the user. Using the age, biological sex, cardio respiratory fitness

mmoll_raw_corrTriglyceridesMean.description: mean value of the triglycerides of the user. Using the age, biological sex, cardio respiratory fitness

mmoll_raw_corrTriglyceridesStdev.description: standard deviation value of the triglycerides of the user. Using the age, biological sex, cardio respiratory fitness

mmoll_adj_corrTriglyceridesRange.description: Calculated range values of the triglycerides of the user. Using the age, biological sex, cardio respiratory fitness

num_raw_vai.description: Calculated visceral adiposity index (VAI) of the user.

num_raw_waistToHeightRatio.description: Calculated waist to height ratio of the user. Using the waist circumference and height

num_raw_waistToHipRatio.description: Calculated waist to height ratio of the user. Using the waist circumference and hip circumference

int_raw_anxietyScore.description: Calculated anxiety score of the user.

int_raw_depressionScore.description: Calculated depression score of the user.

array_raw_bpDistribution.description: Calculated probability distribution of the blood pressure of the user (Hypotensive, Normal, Elevated, Stage 1, Stage 2, Crisis). Using the diastolic BP list and Systolic BP list

date_raw_assessmentCalculation.description: date when the assessment calculations/lambda call is made, format: YYYY-MM-DD (1990-05-20)
